alert.note: Alert for Cass; Marion; Morris; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 9:06PM CDT until March 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Southern Morris County in northeastern Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lone Star, or 17 miles east of Pittsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daingerfield, Linden, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Ore City, Lodi, Jenkins, Cedar Springs, Kildare, Fairview, Avinger, Lassater, Red Hill and Pruett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
